revision.text:
====EV Formulas==== '''When a Pokémon has fewer than 50 EVs:'''
\colorbox{White}{$ \text{EV Damage Multiplier} = 1 + \left (\frac{\text{EVs}}{100} \right)$}

'''When a Pokémon has greater than 50 EVs:'''
\colorbox{White}{$ \text{EV Damage Multiplier} = \text{EVs}^{(\frac{\log 1.5}{\log 50})}$}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
